profile.name: Anthony Yeo Woon Pert
profile.summary: I am a software engineer who builds reliable, maintainable systems used in real business environments. I specialize in .NET backends and thoughtful front-end experiences that keep teams moving with clarity. I enjoy translating complex requirements into clean, working solutions that respect performance and long-term support. Beyond code, I lead teams, mentor peers, and communicate with empathy to align stakeholders.

projects.title: Trading Operations Console
projects.overview: A consolidated console that surfaces daily trading exceptions, reconciles incoming data, and provides an audit trail for finance and operations teams.
responsibilities: Designed service boundaries for exception intake and reconciliation.
Built API endpoints and SQL procedures to power operational views.
Paired with analysts to validate data accuracy and workflow fit.
technical: Event-driven ingestion to normalize trade inputs.
Performance tuning on SQL queries for daily batch loads.
